sense.def:
Besedo
else
uporabljamo za izrazi, kot so
anywhere
,
someone
in
what
, kadar nedoločno govorimo o drugem kraju, osebi ali stvari.

cit.quote: drug; nekdo drug, nekje drugje, nekaj drugega

seg.quote: I had nothing else to do.

sense.def:
Izraz
or else
uporabljamo, kadar govorimo o neprijetnih posledicah tega, da nekdo nečesa ne bo storil.

seg.quote: You've got to be very careful or else you'll miss the turn-off into our drive.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
or else
tudi napovemo drugo od dveh možnosti, kadar ne vemo, katera je resnična.

seg.quote: I think I was at school, or else I was staying with a friend.
